      b - The second location
      particle - Particle type
      count - Particle count
      offsetX - The maximum random offset on the X axis
      offsetY - The maximum random offset on the Y axis
      offsetZ - The maximum random offset on the Z axis

    • LineParticle

      Default forceShow = false Default movementSpeed = 0

      b - The second location

      offsetZ - The maximum random offset on the Z axis

    • LineParticle

      public LineParticle​(org.bukkit.Location a, org.bukkit.Location b, org.bukkit.Particle particle, int count, double offsetX, double offsetY, double offsetZ, double speed, boolean forceShow)
      Default movementSpeed = 0
      Parameters:
      a - The first location
      b - The second location
      particle - Particle type
      count - Particle count
      offsetX - The maximum random offset on the X axis
      offsetY - The maximum random offset on the Y axis
      offsetZ - The maximum random offset on the Z axis
      speed - Every particle speed
      forceShow - Show particle when the player is far (256 blocks max.) and when player have minimal particle settings

    • LineParticle

      public LineParticle​(org.bukkit.Location a, org.bukkit.Location b, org.bukkit.Particle particle, int count, double offsetX, double offsetY, double offsetZ, double speed, long movementSpeed)
      Default forceShow = false
      Parameters:
      a - The first location
      b - The second location
      particle - Particle type
      count - Particle count
      offsetX - The maximum random offset on the X axis
      offsetY - The maximum random offset on the Y axis
      offsetZ - The maximum random offset on the Z axis
      speed - Every particle speed
      movementSpeed - The speed in tick to spawn every particle

      public LineParticle​(org.bukkit.Location a, org.bukkit.Location b, org.bukkit.Particle particle, int count, double offsetX, double offsetY, double offsetZ, double speed, boolean forceShow, long movementSpeed)

      b - The second location

      offsetY - The maximum random offset on the Y axis

      movementSpeed - The speed in tick to spawn every particle

    • LineParticle

      public LineParticle​(org.bukkit.Location a, org.bukkit.Location b, org.bukkit.Particle particle, int count, double offsetX, double offsetY, double offsetZ, double speed, boolean forceShow, long movementSpeed, @Nullable T data)
      If you don't know how to use data, you can use the block/item/redstone method adding materialName or color and size
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of particle data, see Particle.getDataType() (Bukkit)
      Parameters:
      a - The first location
      b - The second location
      particle - Particle type
      count - Particle count
      offsetX - The maximum random offset on the X axis
      offsetY - The maximum random offset on the Y axis
      offsetZ - The maximum random offset on the Z axis
      speed - Every particle speed
      forceShow - Show particle when the player is far (256 blocks max.) and when player have minimal particle settings
      movementSpeed - The speed in tick to spawn every particle
      data - This is used at block/item particles to set data and at redstone particle to set color

    • LineParticle

      public LineParticle​(org.bukkit.Location a, org.bukkit.Location b, org.bukkit.Particle particle, int count, double offsetX, double offsetY, double offsetZ, double speed, boolean forceShow, long movementSpeed, java.lang.String materialName)
      This is used for Block/Item Particles
      Parameters:
      a - The first location
      b - The second location
      particle - Particle type
      count - Particle count
      offsetX - The maximum random offset on the X axis
      offsetY - The maximum random offset on the Y axis
      offsetZ - The maximum random offset on the Z axis
      speed - Every particle speed
      forceShow - Show particle when the player is far (256 blocks max.) and when player have minimal particle settings
      movementSpeed - The speed in tick to spawn every particle
      materialName - The material name

    • LineParticle

      public LineParticle​(org.bukkit.Location a, org.bukkit.Location b, org.bukkit.Particle particle, int count, double offsetX, double offsetY, double offsetZ, double speed, boolean forceShow, long movementSpeed, org.bukkit.Color color, int size)
      This is used for Redstone Particle
      Parameters:
      a - The first location
      b - The second location
      particle - Particle type
      count - Particle count
      offsetX - The maximum random offset on the X axis
      offsetY - The maximum random offset on the Y axis
      offsetZ - The maximum random offset on the Z axis
      speed - Every particle speed
      forceShow - Show particle when the player is far (256 blocks max.) and when player have minimal particle settings
      movementSpeed - The speed in tick to spawn every particle
      color - The redstone dust color
      size - The redstone dust size
